Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the tinned pork in the photo has not been certified halal.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that halal certification is a scam by falsely stating that the tinned pork is halal certified.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the claim that halal certification is a scam.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the presence of a halal stamp on the tinned pork implies that halal certification is fraudulent.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the presence of the halal stamp, which is that it was purposefully edited onto the photo.
